dataviz_critique.title: Data Visualization Challenge
dataviz_critique.question_text: Examine their plot and find at least three bad data viz practices. Then say which one you think is the worst and why.

chapter5_q8.title: Chapter 5, Question 8: Summarizing Center
chapter5_q8.question_text: Examine this plot showing gene expression levels in different tissues. Identify at least three weaknesses in its design. Then say which one you think is the most serious and why.
